component.name: Mojave-GTK
component.summary: Mojave-Style Theme for GTK Flatpak Applications

description.p: This Flatpak provides a Mojave-style GTK theme in a form that can be used by other Flatpak applications.
Attributions: This theme was created by Vince Liuice, based on horst3180' Arc theme.
To match the appearance of this theme with Snap applications, install and follow the instructions at Genadi Naydenov's coordinating Snap package: https://snapcraft.io/mojave-themes

To match the appearance of this theme with non-Flatpak and non-Snap applications, install and follow the instructions at Vince Liuice's Github repository: https://github.com/vinceliuice/Mojave-gtk-theme
A coordinating Mojave-style icon theme is available here: https://github.com/vinceliuice/McMojave-circle
